actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain land in the State of California to the Hoopa Valley Tribe.
short_title: Hoopa Valley Reservation South Boundary Adjustment Act

summary.text: Hoopa Valley Reservation South Boundary Adjustment Act - Provides for: (1) conveyance of certain land in California to the Hoopa Valley Tribe for addition to the Hoopa Valley Reservation; and (2) boundary adjustment of the Six Rivers National Forest to exclude such transferred land.

titles.title: Hoopa Valley Reservation South Boundary Adjustment Act
A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain land in the State of California to the Hoopa Valley Tribe.
